section.title: Introduction
section.para: @product.name@ implements the Web Container defined by the Web Applications Specification chapter of the OSGi Service Platform Release 4 Version 4.2 Enterprise Specification. This specification may be downloaded here.

section.title: About This Guide
section.para:
This User Guide contains step-by-step instructions on how to use @product.name@. This User Guide will enable you to:
Install @product.name@
Deploy and request a simple web application
Configure Apache Tomcat
Configure OSGi Framework
